title: The fashion editors' verdict on the best high-street coats for every occasion
text:
Checks, scarf necks, faux fur, reversible and classic cuts: the high street is awash with winter coats, and there’s one to suit every style. And, with prices from £56, every budget too...

Caroline Leaper

There is not a single coat in Boden's collection for this winter that I would call boring. I'm all for classics (especially in this product category, where you're likely to spend a little more, and expect the most wear out of it) but every coat on the its website right now has a twist. The brand's best efforts are its colour-blocked styles, which incorporate fun pops of uplifting hues with wearable base tones to great effect. This one, the 'Farleigh', comes in navy with red and cream panels,...
